data.app_name: The Pirate Queen with Lucy Liu
data.description:
Embark on an epic journey through the turbulent waters of history in "The Pirate Queen", with Lucy Liu üåü

![{"height":224,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982662_7513468888773292_7586277367396825871_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=dbkjbR6pcbQQ7kNvgGoqJTG&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYARnfdCfMGtz7IFbq-g4dFL2LDkn8ITFarBQt2C04lZrg&oe=66B8A11C)

Step into the boots of the legendary pirate Cheng Shih and see if you have what it takes to become history's most powerful pirate  üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏è


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39036653_1456869748359051_7076517034930849202_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=yi6qxPr-CRIQ7kNvgHgEX3U&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCllKJBCkbeTwlPyO2rzUcj8rRIasxx_g9tzbivVMUKsw&oe=66B8AAA4)


Travel back in time with this immersive story, perfect for explorers of all ages. Whether you're seeking a fresh adventure, yearning to escape into another world, or eager to unearth a hidden gem from history, this legend is for you.

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003263_961033948683270_8273646164126363713_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=4EQbny4u-W8Q7kNvgGbysBn&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYABRPe-Rp534SL7fJb_BgQaySB4lZTLSb3EGyJ6RyQnbQ&oe=66B89207)

With light gameplay elements, the focus is on the narrative. Dive into a story-rich experience lasting 1-4 hours ‚è≥, climb rigging, explore moonlit cabins üåô, unearth hidden artefacts, and exercise your wit to become leader of the Red Flag Fleet.  

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031579_801519894943640_3850714342256227051_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=NP0vP0wfztkQ7kNvgE3RCxz&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDSjlBuJqKca62lPldIPTsARYx-yBRKX056XVuHyMHRkQ&oe=66B884E6)

![{"height":231,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031400_1653444588750690_8451663376835143463_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=U00U_qWM5QEQ7kNvgHhukLG&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYC02Hoqu-l3xdtDJqsg7kcl-vqgvF8iWnzGZIWfBVGBlQ&oe=66B8B158)

Celebrated for its cinematic story and historical environments, this non-combat experience has earned critical acclaim, winning the Tribeca Storyscapes Award (2023) & the Raindance Discovery Award (2021) üèÜ

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75322595_315227141608157_6664541123259039926_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=H91XPlyjLMsQ7kNvgE1hEe_&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAwGDcvhncwJFOUBIgwVN90viIHfr6tZ3Pfy9k23zSUAA&oe=66B8ADD9)


![{"height":225,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974820_419365674368364_6471370540204954427_n.png?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=kCm9dJSV8wkQ7kNvgGoWsJJ&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAiXrMTDXaZzYO4IB3Wczc4AVhLXZZqsUu0rgJY_jD5KQ&oe=66B893F0)

Experience the captivating performance from Hollywood actress Lucy Liu üé≠, who brings Cheng Shih's character to life, under the direction of critically acclaimed filmmaker and creative director Eloise Singer üé¨


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57569455_779145490949371_5639970595016054333_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=4tYPdvdkamAQ7kNvgEAIUJI&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDRmq-VnhjwG1lxgUHa-cKS_HMbvUUGXp0EMx7WGs6DHw&oe=66B87E6A)

![{"height":244,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75593949_1392764491611640_7662168618929982906_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=5r2hXFa1LWEQ7kNvgEKZoB0&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDaDU18ZraDOSfuvtfjv-7gTWw6LMLl9BZ-OH8HU78C0Q&oe=66B89217)

Are you ready to turn the tides of history? Let's see how well you fare as The Pirate Queen! üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏èüëë



![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75251817_478868781249664_4666816330504461518_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=lJMJ0KEU3tgQ7kNvgEeWnHo&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAEqrTJBkHYn4rQxO5Ooli0oqGXdya_MjRf0MIyG3Ejsg&oe=66B8AD8C)
